mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "order.id", a.comments AS "comments", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", su.name as "createBy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user su on su.id=a.create_id LEFT join sys_user us on us.id=a.update_id LEFT join biz_order_header oh on oh.id=a.order_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_order_comment( id, order_id, comments, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order.id}, #{comments}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_order_comment SET order_id = #{order.id}, comments = #{comments}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
